counter.framing: waist‚Äëup two‚Äëshot with cookie container foreground
keep hands visible for the slap and bite.
concept: Kitchen cookie ‚Äòcurse‚Äô skit. Friend slaps hand away; Mia bites cookie and a VO claims it ‚Äúmakes you (BEEP) girls.‚Äù Keep it cheeky and PG‚Äë13 with a 0.3s [BEEP]/[CENSOR] overlay and on‚Äëscreen clarifier that it‚Äôs a joke. Dominant Slavic banter; Phase‚Äë1 solo.
wardrobe: : light green top (Mia) / darker green top (friend) for contrast; secure fits.AudioOption A (trend): Use the VO; add 0.3s [BEEP] over the explicit word; subtle chime when cookie lifts.Option B: Record clean VO: ‚ÄúUh‚Äëuh‚Äëuh‚Ä¶ careful with that cookie.‚Äù + ‚ÄúThis cookie makes you [BEEP] girls.‚ÄùCaptions: if used, write ‚Äúf‚Äî‚Äù with em‚Äëdash to keep PG‚Äë13.Tease Mechanic (platform‚Äësafe)‚ÄúComment COOKIE if you‚Äôd risk it.‚Äù‚ÄúYour country‚Äôs most dangerous cookie? (PG‚Äë13)‚Äù‚ÄúCrunchy or chewy‚Äîchoose wisely.‚ÄùBeat‚Äëby‚ÄëBeat (00:00

00:06 Mia bites cookie. VO: ‚ÄúThis cookie makes you f‚Äî girls.‚Äù Add 0.3s [BEEP]/[CENSOR] on the word; on‚Äëscreen footnote: ‚Äúit‚Äôs a joke, relax.‚Äù

00:07 Cut to friend (darker green) wide‚Äëeyed at camera. Button on Mia‚Äôs smug look to lens.On‚ÄëScreen Text (safe set for captions)careful with the cookiethis cookie makes you f‚Äî girls [BEEP]it‚Äôs a joke, relax[CENSOR]
